Yes &#9; No ( X ) &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; NOTICE TO THE MARKET &nbsp; NU HOLDINGS LTD. &nbsp; Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, April 16, 2025 - Nu Holdings Ltd. (&quot;Nu&quot; or the &quot;Company&quot;) (NYSE: NU) hereby informs its shareholders and the market that it has filed today, April 16, its Annual Report on Form 20-F (&ldquo;Form 20-F&rdquo;) with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (&quot;SEC&quot;). This document refers to the fiscal year ended December 31, 2024. &nbsp; The documents have been posted on our Investor Relations website:&nbsp; https://www.investidores.nu/en/ &nbsp; Company shareholders may receive a hard copy of the Form 20-F, which contains our complete audited financial statements, free of charge, upon request. Requests should be directed to: investors@nubank.com.br &nbsp; &nbsp; Investor Relations Guilherme Souto investors@nubank.com.br &nbsp; Media Relations Leila Suwwan press@nubank.com.br &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; SIGNATURES Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned, thereunto duly authorized. &nbsp; &nbsp; Nu Holdings Ltd. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; By:&nbsp; /s/ Jorg Friedemann &nbsp; &nbsp; Jorg Friedemann Investor Relations Officer &nbsp; Date:&nbsp;&nbsp;April 16, 2025 &nbsp;
